component.name: KeePassXC
component.summary: Community-driven port of the Windows application “KeePass Password Safe”

description.p: KeePassXC is an application for people with extremely high demands on secure personal data management. It has a light interface, is cross-platform and published under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
